content: **this design is a premium pattern a free version of this pattern is also available on my blog the paid premium version offers a tidy and neatly formatted pdf digital download that is ad-free and printer friendly ** > show off your finished project in the > sweet bee crochet facebook community > click here to join 1 crochet this beautiful and colourful scarf using less than 1 cake of lion brand mandala described by testers as a relaxing and meditative pattern this scarf design is an easy project to take on the go or work on while catching up with your favourite shows wear your finished piece as a scarf or stitch the ends together to create an infinity scarf if that s more your style **inside the pattern you will find ** - detailed written instructions - special stitch definitions and stitch placement photo - clear photos - required tools approximate yardage required * **materials needed ** - one cake of lion brand mandala approximately 570 yards required i used the warlock colourway - 5mm hook - measuring tape - yarn needle - scissors > **find other patterns in the granny row collection ** > - one skein granny row neck warmer 2 > - two skein granny row wrap 3 ***this pattern has been tested so you can feel confident in your purchase please note this is a digital file and not a finished product there will be no refunds on digital products*** 1 https //www facebook com/groups/sweetbeecrochet 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/one-skein-granny-row-neck-warmer 3 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/two-skein-granny-row-wrap
